name: SPITFIRE Paradise
description:
Welcome to SPITFIRE Paradise, a score attack shoot 'em up!

This game was created in three days for the ScoreSpace Jam #16🕹️!

[EPILEPSY WARNING: This game contains rapidly flashing light effects!]

Key Features

  • Hordes of enemies that spawn when you speedkill enemy waves!
  • A scoring system that rewards aggressiveness and taking risks!
  • Online leaderboards!

Controls

  • Mouse: Navigate menus
  • Esc: Quit game
  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Shift: Slow movement
  • Z: Forward shot
  • X: Diagonal shot
  • C: Clone bomb

Scoring System

  • Scoring in this game revolves around the multiplier system!
  • Kill enemies at point blank to make them drop lots of green ammo items!
  • Use a bomb to kill enemies to start the multiplier!
  • Kill enemies while the multiplier is running to keep the chain going and make them drop yellow ammo items that increase your multiplier!
  • Kill the boss within the time limit for a huge bonus!
